text: Anderson Hays Vanderbilt Cooper (born June 3, 1967) is an American journalist. He is an anchor on CNN. He hosts Anderson Cooper 360Â° and the syndicated daytime talk show, Anderson Live. == Early life == Cooper was born in New York City. His mother is Gloria Vanderbilt; his father was Wyatt Emory Cooper. Cooper's great-great-great-grandfather was Cornelius Vanderbilt, a 19th- century American businessman and slave owner. == Personal life == On July 2, 2012, Cooper came out as gay. ==References== Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:American television news anchors Category:Gay men Category:Journalists from New York City Category:LGBT broadcasters Category:LGBT journalists Category:LGBT people from New York City Category:Television personalities from New York City Category:Writers from New York City Category:American bloggers Category:People with dyslexia Category:American LGBT writers
